Container.Name: FileShelter
Container.Overview:
DESCRIPTION FileShelter is a self-hosted software that allows you to easily share files over the Internet. Just upload one or more files and get an URL back!
Here you have a live demo: http://fileshelter.demo.poupon.io/
NOTES • FileShelter uses a default configuration file, located in '/etc/fileshelter.conf', but you can overwrite it by mapping it on your host: '/path/to/my/fileshelter.conf' (host) and 'target=/etc/fileshelter.conf' (container).
VERSION 1.0 (2021-12-11)
